What are the stages of Pancreatic Cancer ?,"Key Points
                    - Tests and procedures to stage pancreatic cancer are usually done at the same time as diagnosis.     - There are three ways that cancer spreads in the body.    - Cancer may spread from where it began to other parts of the body.    - The following stages are used for pancreatic cancer:         - Stage 0 (Carcinoma in Situ)
